subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: A newly formed Russian hockey league accused the N.H.L. of poaching two of its players when the Los Angeles Kings agreed to terms with two draft prospects last week. As a result, the Continental Hockey League announced that it was no longer obligated to abide by a moratorium reached in July, when the leagues agreed against signing players who were under contract.
